snippet: Part of the problem may be that there are few consequences for companies with a lax attitude toward data. There are no legal penalties, and customers rarely defect.
abstract: Breach and data theft of LinkedIn's site surprises customers and security experts, who are amazed by company's bare-bones approach to security; breach highlights disturbing truth that companies with customer data continue to gamble on their own computer security, even as the break-ins increase.
lead_paragraph: Part of the problem may be that there are few consequences for companies with a lax attitude toward data. There are no legal penalties, and customers rarely defect.

headline.seo: LinkedIn Breach Exposes Light Security Even at Data Companies
headline.main: Lax Security at LinkedIn Is Laid Bare
headline.print_headline: Lax Security At LinkedIn Is Laid Bare
